name: The IdolM@ster: Platinum Stars
description:
Finally a stage for PlayStation®4.
Create a specular wave!

It is the latest THE IDOLM＠STER title for PlayStation®4!
Join the camp and live with 13 idols from the 765 Production as a producer.
Help them become top idols by teaching and interacting with them!
Create a new story by working towards the success for the biggest event—the extreme live.

With the best graphics in THE IDOLM＠STER history,
you will meet attractive and energetic 765 Production idols!
